Text.Page:
Those rotten little fleabags!

My family's been brewing berry wine for centuries but those {@LinkCreature:23#3#popori exiles} stole our current stock!

If we don't get that back, we'll be ruined. We can't pay our taxes, or buy those funny little mushrooms! Can you help us?

That's it! That's our wine! You saved it!

I'm amazed those mangy wretches didn't drink it already!

Thank you so much!

Please, don't come back without the wine. I couldn't bear it.

Sorry, popori humor.
